short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
使用send2boox浏览器扩展可将网页（可生成pdf）推送到boox帐户
Use the send2boox browser extension to push the webpage (can generate pdf) to the boox account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Print any page to Boox reader (via boox push service)
Like "push to kindle" or "read it later", with this extension, 
you can push any web page to your Boox reader, as PDF.
